aboutAppDesc:
PayPay is a money management app that will help you orgnaize your financial stuff and make it a lot easier.
Currently the app is still being developed which means that this version of the app is just a beta version for getting user's feedbacks and collecting more ideas about how we can make it more effecient and more helpful
welcome_desc2:
Welcome to PayPay, we hope
we can make your life much
more organized
change_color_theme_description: is trying to give you the best experience when using the app, that's why we provided you with four color themes to choose what works best for you.
success_description: New Color was set successfully but you will need to restart the app in order for changes to be applied
